data.text:
How many games are on the Anbernic RG351P?

Titles can differ between suppliers and over time as Anbernic reserves the right to adjust the cards and titles shipped with the 351P and 351M models, the initial standard release came with around 2,500 titles running EmuELEC.

Two systems proven to get more performance out of these Anbernic consoles are ArkOS and 351ELEC. Both of these are stable releases and make running more demanding systems and titles from N64 and Playstation more achievable.

Please note this list is a guide only;

1942 - mame - arcade

10-Pin Bowling - Gameboy Colour

10-Yard Fight - MSX

1942 - MSX
